author: silviodonato
body:
This PR adds --customise and --eras options in hltGetConfiguration. They are useful for the HLT developers to run HLT with the phase1 geometry.

The effect of --eras era1,era2 is to add in the py file
`from Configuration.StandardSequences.Eras import eras`
`process = cms.Process( "HLTX", eras.era1, eras.era2 )`

The effect of --customise folder/folder.function is to add
`from folder.folder import function
process = function(process)`
title: New options in hltGetConfiguration
